layer_sequence_get_y.htm+html.head.title: layer_sequence_get_y.htm+html.body.p:87-3
layer_sequence_get_y: With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the current Y position in the game room for the sequence.

layer_sequence_get_y.htm+html.head.title: layer_sequence_get_y.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:99-9
layer_sequence_get_y: The unique ID value of the sequence element to target

layer_sequence_get_y.htm+html.head.title: layer_sequence_get_y.htm+html.body.p:111-3
layer_sequence_get_y: The above code checks the Y position of the sequence element ID stored in the variable "title_sequence", and if it's not set to half the room height, it is set to this value.
